question:
Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyan (PMGDISHA):
  1. has been launched to impart digital literacy to senior citizens
  2. will provide access to information, knowledge, education, and healthcare.
  3. is a part of Skill India umbrella
Which of the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyan is the project launched under \"Skill India\" scheme. PMGDISHA is aimed at imparting digital literacy to citizens in rural areas, and not specifically senior citizens. It will provide access to information, knowledge, education, and healthcare. It will create avenues for livelihood generation, and financial inclusion through digital payments. PMGDISHA scheme was initiated in February 2017 by the Government to provide basic digital literacy training to six crore citizens across rural India within two years, targeting at least one person from every household. PMGDISHA envisage to provide equal opportunity to rural citizens enabling them to actively participate in nation building and access livelihood through Digital Technology, Devices and Services.
